author: Sam Baker
title: Coronavirus response all comes back to testing
description: Detroit Mayor Mike Duggan announced on Friday that the city will start making diagnostic tests available to all employees of “essential” businesses, and to city employees performing essential services.Why it matters: It’s the first program of its kind, and a …
content:
Detroit Mayor Mike Duggan announced on Friday that the city will start making diagnostic tests available to all employees of essential businesses, and to city employees performing essential services.
